des:
The Perna Syndicate: Connecting Education, Careers, and Workforce Development
Every weekday, join bestselling author and professional speaker Mark C. Perna in his quest to shift the paradigm for students, educators, employers—and for you. 

In The Perna Syndicate 90-second micro-podcast, Mark tackles the topics that matter most to parents, educators, business leaders, and community stakeholders. You’ll experience his remarkably fresh outlook on a range of timely topics, including workforce trends, education best practices, career advice, personal motivation, and more. 

Mark, who delivers more than 70 keynotes annually across North America and consults with the nation’s leading educational and business organizations, has forged a new perspective on today’s young people. Amid our challenging post-pandemic economy, they have incredible potential—we just need to unleash it. 

At home, in the classroom, and on the job, Mark empowers you to make the most of your interactions with millennials and Generation Z. After successfully parenting two millennials as a single father, Mark has become a passionate advocate for bridging the generational divides that are contributing to America’s profound skills gap. Parents, schools, districts, businesses, and organizations across North America have successfully used Mark’s strategies to connect more effectively with the younger generations.

Mark is a weekly contributor at Forbes.com with a focus on shifting the workplace paradigm and navigating today’s four-generation workplace dynamic. In his work with educational and business organizations, Mark has pioneered many best practices, including the Education with Purpose® philosophy and popular Career Tree® strategy, among others. Mark, who interviews frequently on radio shows, television, and podcasts, is often cited as the national expert in education enrollment, retention, and performance.

Find out for yourself why thousands of parents, educators, leaders, and employers are raving about Mark’s insights—and why more and more people are joining the Syndicate every day. Catch The Perna Syndicate on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google HOME, Google Podcasts, and Alexa for a daily dose of Mark’s proven best practices to shift the paradigm in careers, education, and workforce development.
